sourcesContent:
import React,{useReducer} from 'react'; import '../css/baskets.css'; import utils from '../utils' import {ADD_TO_CART} from '../actions/types' import productReducer from '../reducer/productReducer' const Baskets = (props) => { const initialStateProducts = { products:[], filteredProducts:[], search:"", cartItems:[] } const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(productReducer, initialStateProducts) return(
Cart
{state.cartItems.length} Items
{state.cartItems.length>0 ?
{state.cartItems.map(item => (

{item.title}

props.onRemoveCart(item)} className="minus"/> dispatch({type:ADD_TO_CART,data:item})} className="plus"/>

{utils.formatCurrency(item.price * item.count)}

)) }
Subtotal {utils.formatCurrency(state.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0))}

Extra charges may apply

:''}
) } export default Baskets;
